channel.title: Gerald the Cup ► Black Mesa Funny Moments
channel.description:
Heyzzah everybody,
I would like to share with all of you a Black Mesa video I have made in campaign mode. This video is intended to be funny, and not a thorough walkthrough of the game, so please keep that in mind when giving feedback.
Enjoy!
(For optimal sound quality, set the computer's "main" volume to around 50 or so.)
[youtube.com/watch?v=XLvLFqWFNus](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XLvLFqWFNus)
